lore: The Prismatic Cruncher is a rare example of a Cruncher that was born from a wall in which a Carbuncle had laid an egg. Unlike the rest of its kind, it only feeds on rocks and metal, and it cares about the Carbuncles' well-being. Many Carbuncles take advantage of the fact that the other Crunchers rarely attack this creature and hide their eggs in the cracks of its shell. For this reason, it is a multicolored creature whose pigmentation is determined by the species of Carbuncle that laid the egg.
menagerieDialog: (Upon your approach, it withdraws into its shell. It must be tired.)
(It's jaw is ridiculously powerful, capable of cutting through even the strongest of materials. And fingers.)
(Rhea often brings your kingdom's spare Spell Gems to this creature to eat.)
(It slowly cranes its neck toward you and takes a bite out of your shirt.)
(As you watch it devour a pile of uncharged Spell Gems, you can't help but wince at the thought of it accidentally getting ahold of your fingers.)
name: Prismatic Cruncher
